biblStruct.note: Several letters of Christological content are transmitted under the authorship of Philoxenus of Mabbug. This includes his letter to the community of Arzun, located in the Sasanian Empire, east of Amida. This letter has survived in an excerpt in a manuscript from the 7th/8th century. In the following, this letter is edited and translated for the first time and embedded in the context of other contemporary writings.
